subject: Re: Here we go again,
author: tim_woolworth
full_text:
To me this was wholly unintelligible.  I'm sorry, I could not make out a single word.  It does sound like something was trying to communicate, but had yet to master the method in which to do so.  

Also, was that rain in the background?  If it was, was there lightning?  Lightning makes communication next to impossible because you get bursts of static noise.  

Tim


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Let me know if and what you guys can understand, what words you can  make 
> out, sf
>
